text: Bi Boua Paterne Boulou (born 25 February 1983) is a former Ivorian footballer who played as a defender. ==Career== Bi Boua began his career with Toumodi FC. He joined R.O.C. de Charleroi-Marchienne in Belgium in 2005. He left Charleroi in the summer of 2008 and joined R. Union Saint-Gilloise.Bolou Bi Boua file à l’Union After just one year with R. Union Saint-Gilloise, he left on 1 July 2009 the club and signed with HSV Hoek in the Netherlands.Bolou vervangt bij Hoek de vertrekkende Koné He left Hoek in the winter-break of the 2009-10 season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Ivorian expatriates in Belgium Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Royale Union Saint-Gilloise players Category:R.O.C. de Charleroi- Marchienne players Category:Toumodi FC players Category:HSV Hoek players Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan Category:Association football defenders
title: Bi Boua Paterne Boulou
